        public android.graphics.Bitmap retrieveBitmap(java.lang.String url)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: ImageLoaderManager
        Fetches a Bitmap from a remote location and returns it. This method isn't asynchronous, for async image loading you should use #postImage(ImageReference) instead.
